content: simple stranded colorwork cowl in two colors easily adjustable for diameter and width worked in worsted-weight yarn gauge is not crucial but it is recommended that it be knit tightly thus the recommendation of using size 4 and 6 needles since a more airy fabric will not be as warm the design is inspired by 4-shaft weaving patterns i would love a tag if you make this and post pictures ravelry @mashkanna instragram @mashkanna happy knitting *marianne
